verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> thou unto them that prophesy <S%H5030><s%> out of their own hearts, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3820><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the foolish <S%H5036><s%> prophets, <S%H5030><s%> that <S%H834><s%> follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> their own spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and have seen <S%H7200><s%> nothing! <S%H1115><s%>
O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> thy prophets <S%H5030><s%> are <S%H1961><s%> like the foxes <S%H7776><s%> in the deserts. <S%H2723><s%>

Ye have not <S%H3808><s%> gone up <S%H5927><s%> into the gaps, <S%H6556><s%> neither made up <S%H1443><s%> the hedge <S%H1447><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

They have seen <S%H2372><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%> and lying <S%H3577><s%> divination, <S%H7081><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> saith: <S%H5002><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them: and they have made others to hope <S%H3176><s%> that they would confirm <S%H6965><s%> the word. <S%H1697><s%>

Have ye not <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H2372><s%> a vain <S%H7723><s%> vision, <S%H4236><s%> and have ye not spoken <S%H559><s%> a lying <S%H3577><s%> divination, <S%H4738><s%> whereas ye say, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> it; albeit I <S%H589><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> spoken? <S%H1696><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> ye have spoken <S%H1696><s%> vanity, <S%H7723><s%> and seen <S%H2372><s%> lies, <S%H3577><s%> therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And mine hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that see <S%H2372><s%> vanity, <S%H7723><s%> and that divine <S%H7080><s%> lies: <S%H3577><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they be written <S%H3789><s%> in the writing <S%H3791><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Because, <S%H3282><s%> even because <S%H3282><s%> they have seduced <S%H2937><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Peace; <S%H7965><s%> and there was no <S%H369><s%> peace; <S%H7965><s%> and one <S%H1931><s%> built up <S%H1129><s%> a wall, <S%H2434><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> others daubed <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar:

Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them which daub <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar, that it shall fall: <S%H5307><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> shower; <S%H1653><s%> and ye, <S%H859><s%> O great hailstones, <S%H68><s%> <S%H417><s%> shall fall; <S%H5307><s%> and a stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> shall rend <S%H1234><s%> it.

Lo, <S%H2009><s%> when the wall <S%H7023><s%> is fallen, <S%H5307><s%> shall it not <S%H3808><s%> be said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, Where <S%H346><s%> is the daubing <S%H2915><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> ye have daubed <S%H2902><s%> it?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I will even rend <S%H1234><s%> it with a stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> in my fury; <S%H2534><s%> and there shall be <S%H1961><s%> an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> shower <S%H1653><s%> in mine anger, <S%H639><s%> and great hailstones <S%H68><s%> <S%H417><s%> in my fury <S%H2534><s%> to consume <S%H3617><s%> it.

So will I break down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H853><s%> the wall <S%H7023><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye have daubed <S%H2902><s%> with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar, and bring it down <S%H5060><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the ground, <S%H776><s%> so that the foundation <S%H3247><s%> thereof shall be discovered, <S%H1540><s%> and it shall fall, <S%H5307><s%> and ye shall be consumed <S%H3615><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus will I accomplish <S%H3615><s%> <S%H853><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon the wall, <S%H7023><s%> and upon them that have daubed <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar, and will say <S%H559><s%> unto you, The wall <S%H7023><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> more, neither <S%H369><s%> they that daubed <S%H2902><s%> it;

To wit, the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> which prophesy <S%H5012><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and which see <S%H2372><s%> visions <S%H2377><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> for her, and there is no <S%H369><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Likewise, thou <S%H859><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of thy people, <S%H5971><s%> which prophesy <S%H5012><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> their own heart; <S%H3820><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> thou against <S%H5921><s%> them,

And say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the women that sew <S%H8609><s%> pillows <S%H3704><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> armholes, <S%H679><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> kerchiefs <S%H4555><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> stature <S%H6967><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> souls! <S%H5315><s%> Will ye hunt <S%H6679><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> and will ye save the souls alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H5315><s%> that come unto you?

And will ye pollute <S%H2490><s%> me among <S%H413><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> for handfuls <S%H8168><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> and for pieces <S%H6595><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> to slay <S%H4191><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> should not <S%H3808><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> and to save the souls alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> should not <S%H3808><s%> live, <S%H2421><s%> by your lying <S%H3576><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%> that hear <S%H8085><s%> your lies? <S%H3577><s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> your pillows, <S%H3704><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> hunt <S%H6679><s%> <S%H853><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> to make them fly, <S%H6524><s%> and I will tear <S%H7167><s%> them from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> your arms, <S%H2220><s%> and will let the souls go, <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%> even <S%H853><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> hunt <S%H6679><s%> to make them fly. <S%H6524><s%>

<S%H853><s%> Your kerchiefs <S%H4555><s%> also will I tear, <S%H7167><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%> to be hunted; <S%H4686><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> with lies <S%H8267><s%> ye have made the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> sad, <S%H3512><s%> whom I <S%H589><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> made sad; <S%H3510><s%> and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> that he should not <S%H1115><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> from his wicked way, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H7451><s%> by promising him life: <S%H2421><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> ye shall see <S%H2372><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> vanity, <S%H7723><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> divine <S%H7080><s%> divinations: <S%H7081><s%> for I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
